about_the_game: This DLC gives you the story's text, in a PDF file.

content_descriptors.notes:
This story contains content intended for an adult audience, in text form.

* Sexual assault (rape) scenes, male x female.
* Consent sex scene between a man and a woman. 

All depicted characters are over 18 years old.

detailed_description: This DLC gives you the story's text, in a PDF file.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
